metadata.Title: CVE-2019-0210 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Apache Thrift 0.9.3 to 0.12.0, a server implemented in Go usingTJSONProtocol or TSimpleJSONProtocol may panic when feed with invalid inputdata.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-0210` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libthrift-0.13.0 - 0.13.0-2build1
libthrift-c-glib0 - 0.13.0-2build1
libthrift-perl - 0.13.0-2build1
php-thrift - 0.13.0-2build1
python3-thrift - 0.13.0-2build1
thrift-compiler - 0.13.0-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thrift package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.13.0-2build1').
